docs.lead_paragraph: Increased profits in the September quarter were shownby three drug and chemical producers the American Home Products Corporation, the Bristol-Myers Company and Richardson-Merrell, Inc. in their reports issued yesterday. Only the Celanese Corporation, a leading maker of synthetic fibers that is important in chemicals, plastics and coatings, had lower thirdquarter results.
